name: MermaidSounds
0:
”Alexa open Mermaid Sounds”
”Alexa ask Mermaid Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mermaid sounds
des:
Dive into a mystical underwater world with this skill, featuring enchanting vocalizations that one might imagine hearing from mermaids. Accompanied by the soft sounds of underwater currents and distant marine life, it creates an immersive fantasy aquatic experience.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Mermaid Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
